name: Google AI Studio
tagline: Now you can vibe code with your voice
description: Google AI Studio now lets you vibe code with your voice. Hit the mic, describe what you need, and watch it build. The AI strips out filler words and false starts, turning your natural speech into clean prompts. No typing, no friction—just talk and build.

name: Buildrrr
tagline: The Easiest Way To Create Custom Branded DMG Files
description: Buildrrr is a macOS app for creating professional DMG installers. Design layouts, save templates, and add branding with ease. One-click signing, notarization, and stapling ensure Apple-compliant DMGs ready to ship with confidence.

name: JustPaid
tagline: Autonomous AI for billing, contracts, and collections.
description: AI-powered revenue operations platform that automates invoice follow-ups, tracks customer payments, and manages all communications. Streamline your financial processes with intelligent automation.

name: Mittalmar YouTube Software
tagline: Track growing YouTube niches in real time
description: Mittalmar is the most intelligent YouTube Software Ecosystem. Save hours, create with purpose, and grow your YouTube skills and passion to new heights.

name: GensparkAI to Obsidian
tagline: Batch export & download genspark conversations to markdown
description: Effortlessly export, download, and sync all your Genspark conversations to Markdown files in bulk with just one click! Perfect for Obsidian, Notion, Logseq, and other knowledge management tools.

name: Survia AI
tagline: Build Surveys in Seconds with AI
description: The smartest way to build, share, and analyze surveys. Leverage our AI-powered builder, advanced conditional logic, and instant result summarization to turn feedback into actionable insights. Stop guessing, start knowing.

name: VCDir.com
tagline: Search 1,000+ VCs by stage, market, and location for free
description: Free access to 1,300+ VC firms database. VCDir lets founders search & filter investors by stage, market, country & check size no paywalls, no signups. Curated, up-to-date, and founder-friendly.

name: FluxTranslate — LLM Inline Translator
tagline: Translate web pages in context - instantly, and naturally.
description: FluxTranslate brings LLM-powered inline translation to your browser. Unlike Google Translate, it doesn’t just swap words — it preserves tone, and style. Supports custom tone presets, prompt editing, and batch translation.

name: Votice: Feedback Manager
tagline: Receive suggestions and issues from your Apple apps.
description: Votice lets you collect suggestions, issues, comments, and votes directly from your iOS, iPadOS, or macOS apps. Manage all feedback in one place with our companion app. Free for one app; SDK is open source.

name: WebVitals by Sentry
tagline: Free core web vitals analysis tool
description: Analyze your website's Core Web Vitals instantly. Get detailed insights into LCP, FID, CLS, FCP, INP, and TTFB performance metrics. Improve your SEO and user experience with real-world data.

name: Textrans
tagline: Convert long AI-generated text to images
description: Textrans is your flexible companion for mobile AI workflows. It turns long text or Markdown responses into beautiful, structured visuals you can read, save, and share instantly.

name: Urabin
tagline: Web app store. Discover, share, and launch web applications.
description: Urabin - Web app store. Discover, share, and launch web applications.

name: mann
tagline: Two-minute morning check-ins for calm and momentum
description: A warm friend-on-call for 8–11am: tiny check-ins, curated Uplift, and Reflections — built to reduce friction. Also, the simplest way to feel better and follow through: Soothe or Unstick in two minutes, then auto-save a Care Note.

name: MapSwitch
tagline: Convert Map Links!
description: Convert maps between Google, Apple, Waze, Bing and more Maps with ease. Use your favorite platform—fast and simple. Perfect for travelers, drivers, CarPlay & daily users.

name: Taskit
tagline: Create and share collaborative to-do lists
description: Taskit is the simplest way to share a list. Just type your tasks, generate an instant link, and send it. No sign-ups, no fuss. Key features: - Web app, no installation/download required - Create an unique link and share it with anyone, easy and fast

name: PostSmithAI — AI-Powered LinkedIn Posts
tagline: Write authentic LinkedIn posts & comments using AI
description: PostSmithAI helps you create human-sounding, compliant LinkedIn posts and comments instantly using AI — directly within LinkedIn.

name: TaskFino
tagline: All-in-One Office Management Software
description: TaskFino is an all-in-one agency management software built to simplify business operations. Manage HR, accounting, CRM, payroll, tasks, and assets in one platform—boosting productivity and growth at a reasonable cost.

name: Blue Diary
tagline: Capture your mood, memories & moments daily
description: Blue Diary (DailyBean) lets you log moods, snapshots, daily notes, and track how your feelings evolve over time. With a monthly mood calendar, simple icon-based entries, and analytics on what affects you, it turns everyday moments into meaningful insights.

name: WhereFlight - Timezone Converter
tagline: Time conversions made easy.
description: Converting timezones used to be messy, unintuitive, and filled with ads. WhereFlight’s Timezone Converter makes it effortless with a clean design, instant comparisons, and an interactive time slider—built to simplify travel and keep you perfectly in sync.

name: Balance
tagline: Guided meditations tailored to your mood & schedule
description: Balance is a mental wellness app that crafts personalized guided meditations and sleep sessions based on your answers, mood, and goals. It offers 10-day skill plans, single session meditations, breathing exercises, sleep sounds & stories.

name: Google AI Studio
tagline: Now you can vibe code with your voice
description: Google AI Studio now lets you vibe code with your voice. Hit the mic, describe what you need, and watch it build. The AI strips out filler words and false starts, turning your natural speech into clean prompts. No typing, no friction—just talk and build.
